main event: A UFO sighting was reported by pilots of two F-100C aircraft who observed a circular object in the sky at high altitude.
interesting points: The object was described as circular, white, and the size of a pea held at arm's length., The object was sighted far above a weather balloon that was flying at approximately 150,000 feet., The sightings occurred at the same time that a U-2 aircraft was on a classified project in the area., The pilots made observations while investigating a large 'Sky Hook' weather balloon., The object performed a 180-degree turn and streaked toward the Pacific Ocean at high speed.
witness description: pilots from the 436th Fighter Squadron, George AFB, California
